entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: Hagrid is a gamekeeper at Hogwarts and is speaking to Malfoy. He is mentioned as saying 'Right then' and 'now, listen carefully'.

entities.name: malfoy
entities.description: Malfoy is a student at Hogwarts and is being spoken to by Hagrid. He is mentioned as looking at Hagrid furiously.

entities.name: the castle
entities.description: The castle is the location where Malfoy is being told to get back to.

relationships.description: Hagrid speaks to Malfoy, telling him to get back to the castle and pack.
The action of Hagrid speaking to Malfoy is taking place in the castle.
